Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon ="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Script that will be inserted into the target character for damage over time
function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() print("Waiting") end print("Found Child") end
waitForChild(script, "Poison") waitForChild(script, "creator") poison = script:FindFirstChild("Poison")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local poisonDuration = poison.Value.Y local poisonDamage = poison.Value.X
local tag = script:FindFirstChild("creator") local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") tag.Parent = humanoid
local fire
if torso:FindFirstChild("fire") == nil then fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = torso fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) debris:AddItem(fire, 5) end
while poisonDuration > 0 do humanoid:TakeDamage(poisonDamage) poisonDuration = poisonDuration - 1 script.Poison.Value = Vector3.new(script.Poison.Value.X, script.Poison.Value.Y - 1, 0) poisonDuration = script.Poison.Value.Y wait(1.0) end
if fire then fire:Remove() end if tag then tag:Remove() end
wait(1.0) script:Remove()

local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true local Sword = Tool.Handle
local damage = 17
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local slashSound
-- Animations local slashAnim local scimitarWalkAnim local swingAnim
while Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") == nil do wait() end
local fireWeld = Tool.FireWeld
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local newBV
local runService = game:GetService("RunService") local lastKeyDown = 0 local dashTime = 0
local amAnimating = false
function slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso)
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - myTorso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = myTorso myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(myTorso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, myTorso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(0.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(0.5) end
function lungeFire(key) if myHumanoid == nil then return end
print("Lunging") if key == "w" then local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm ~= nil then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip ~= nil and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("InsertScript") == nil then newScript = Tool.InsertScript:Clone() creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Parent = newScript newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = hit.Parent else hit.Parent.InsertScript.Poison.Value = Tool.InsertScript.Poison.Value end
tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end function onActivated()
if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
if myHumanoid == nil then return end
local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then swingAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.LungeSlash) if swingAnim then swingAnim:Play() end wait(0.3) slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) amAnimating = false else slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Slash) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end slashSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("SlashSound") if slashSound then slashSound:Play() end wait(0.6) amAnimating = false end Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if fireWeld then fireWeld.Parent = Tool end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
scimitarWalkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ScimitarWalk) if scimitarWalkAnim then scimitarWalkAnim:Play() end
if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(lungeFire) end end
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if slashSound then slashSound:Stop() end if scimitarWalkAnim then scimitarWalkAnim:Stop() end if swingAnim then swingAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
